actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: Making further dire emergency supplemental appropriations to meet the needs of natural disasters of national significance and for emergency drug funding for the fiscal year 1990, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Makes emergency supplemental appropriations to meet the needs of natural disasters of national significance and for emergency drug funding for FY 1990. Prohibits such expenditures from being charged against the Budget Act, Gramm- Rudman-Hollings, or other ceilings.

titles.title: Making further dire emergency supplemental appropriations to meet the needs of natural disasters of national significance and for emergency drug funding for the fiscal year 1990, and for other purposes.
